nodes.text: ST-45 was a Star Commuter 2000 transport shuttle that ferried passengers between the neighboring Outer Rim planets of Lothal and Garel. The shuttle was piloted by RX-24, a RX-Series pilot droid. The rebels who operated on Lothal traveled from Lothal to Garel aboard the shuttle during their mission to steal T-7 ion disruptor rifles from the Galactic Empire.

ST-45 appeared in "Droids in Distress," the first regular series episode of the animated television series Star Wars Rebels. The shuttle was based on the original incarnation of Star Tours, a Disney theme park attraction. In Star Tours, RX-24 is depicted as the pilot of Star Tours Flight 45 (ST-45), onboard a StarSpeeder 3000 spacecraft. For "Droids in Distress," the shuttle was designed by series artists Pat Presley and Jim Moore.
